content.name: p
children: This listing page display gift cards data with actions to edit and delete. You can click the card number to copy it. As other tables, the info & pagination links are at the bottom of the page.

content.name: p
children: Add/edit sale page uses the same form with following fields

children.name: li
children: : gift car number, type or click # to generate

children.name: li
children: : (optional) if you want to only a customer to use the card

children.name: p
children: If you have any suggestions, please

frontmatter.title: Gift Cards
frontmatter.description: A good way to promote sales is offer gift cards so that your customer can pass this to their family and friends and you get new customers.
